You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
▢ X ▢ X ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢

DESCRIPTION:
This grid is a simple crossword puzzle with a mix of easy and challenging clues. The theme of the puzzle is "travel" and the clues are related to different countries and cultures around the world. The puzzle has a total of 15 clues, with some of them being longer and more complex than others. The grid is arranged in a 5x5 square, with each row and column containing 5 clues. The puzzle is suitable for beginners and experienced crossword solvers alike.
